text: Myronivska power station is a thermal power plant in the Donetsk region. It uses coal to extract energy. It is owned by PJSC "Donetskoblenergo". Myronivska power station was put into operation on October 15, 1953, with the capacity of 100 MW. In 2004, after reconstruction, the boiler № 9 and the turbogenerator № 5 (electric capacity of 115 MW) were put into operation. Category:Power plants Category:Donetsk Oblast Category:Buildings and structures in Ukraine
title: Myronivska Power Station
